mapper.insert: insert into DATADICTIONARY (TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LENGTH, COMMENTS, DATA_PRECISION, DATA_SCALE, NULLABLE) values (#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataPrecision,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dataScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nullable,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LENGTH, COMMENTS, DATA_PRECISION, DATA_SCALE, NULLABLE from DATADICTIONARY
